Text: Does this version crash at the brother fight to?

i dont think so, the build is from february, the brothers fight bug was on release.
ill DL this after crysis 3, i had a old repack, but it had bugs on some items upgrades fights so i deleted it and since the new builds mess up ur saves game,  ill try to play this one again from scratch.

This archive extracts to an unknown file and cannot be mounted even when renaming to .ISO

I have tried mounting with magic iso and also burning with imgburn and neither can read the file
Nevermind.  I thought I had to join the files using hjsplit considering it's .001, .002 etc files but I tried extracting it with WinRAR and now it's good, thanks for the upload.
